Class Hull

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hull(java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> vertices, Vertex extra)
      Create a Hull with ordered vertices
      Hull(Vertex[] vertices)
      Get the convex hull that contains the passed points, using an approximation of the gift wrapping algorithm

    • Method Summary

      Render the hull, as well as midpoint, extra point and vertices

      Render the hull, as well as midpoint, extra point, vertices and intersection poly if passed

      • Hull

        public Hull(java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> vertices,
            Vertex extra)
        Create a Hull with ordered vertices
        Parameters:
        vertices - The ordered list of Vertices
        extra - The possible skipped vertex, can be null

      • Hull

        public Hull(Vertex[] vertices)
        Get the convex hull that contains the passed points, using an approximation of the gift wrapping algorithm
        Parameters:
        vertices - The list of Vertices

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(Camera c,
                   Hull intersections)
        Render the hull, as well as midpoint, extra point, vertices and intersection poly if passed
        Parameters:
        c - The camera to render to
        intersections - The intersection hull, will be ignored if null
